msbt.message: Huh? Really? Oh man! It'll be double the fun with you around!I'll go ask the Resident Services if I can move to this island right away, !
Huh? Really?! Oh man, that's a real cool offer, but I gotta pass this time.My snacks are waiting for me back homeand so are my friends.But thanks for inviting me. It means a bunch, !

Whaaa?! I can live here?!<10_4 /> That'd be super cool, butI have bugs back home that are waiting to see me again. I can't just leave them!Man, thanks for the invite, but I'm real sorry. I gotta head home. It means a lot that ya asked.
Huh?! I can move here?! That'd be super cool, butA bug family just moved into my bathroom walls back home, and I wanna get to know them.Thanks for inviting me, though. I had a lotta fun here, !

Hmm I dunno. It sounds cool but it's real sudden.Oh, got an idea! How 'bout we play a game to decide?If you win, I'll move here. Sound fun? Good! 'Cause it's kinda my only idea right now. Soooooo let's do it!
Sure!
Sorry, I'd rather not...
Huh?! Really? That'd be super cool But I dunno Hmm.Oh! Here's an idea! Why thinkwhen we can play a game instead?!If you win, I move here! Good idea, right?
Sure!
Maybe another time.
I'm so happy you invited me! But I dunnoI can't decide. What should I do?!Wait! I did an idea just now! Let'splay a game to decide!And if you win, I move here. To your island! Sound good?
I'm down!
I'm OK, thanks.
Aw, OK, .
Oh well, !
Aw, you don't wanna?
Alright! Let's get started on the card-game showdown gamethat you play with cards!
I win! Sorry, but I guess I'm not moving here.
I win! Guess I'm not moving this time.
I won, so I won't be moving
What a fun way to spend however long that took, .
That was fun. Maybe I'll get folks to play that game when I get home. Win, and I'll sleep on your couch!
That was exciting! Whew. I dunno if you can see it, but my heart is still pounding, .
That means You win! That's real cool.I'm gonna go home, get all my snacks, and bugs, and stuff, and then I'll move to this island.Next time ya see me, I'll be a fellow islander. I can't wait!
You win! Alright, I'll be moving to !I really wanted to move here, even before the game started, so I was worried what to do if you lost!Problem solved, huh? We're gonna be neighbors! Yay!
That means you win! I'm moving to this island! It's a thing that's happening for real!Man, I gotta call Grandma and tell her I'm gonna miss dinner, .

Sorry for the wait! I went to talk at the Resident Services folks hereThey said there's no more room to build property on this island, so I can't move here. But I could always ask another resident to swap with me? If that's cool with you, .
Go for it.
Please don't.
Aw, OK. That's weird, I know. I'll give up for now!
Yay! Resident Services just told me I can ask these folks if they want out. Who do you think's my best shot?
, right?
Yup.
Oops, wrong one.
Actually, let's not.
OK. I'd be nervous, but I got no idea who they even are, so they can't make me nervous! Off I go!
OK, 'cause I wanna be sure Who should I ask?
Aw, that's a shame. But I'll give up this time, .

I used all of my courage and asked somebody to change their whole life for me, a guy they don't knowAnd they said OK! said was thinkin' about moving soon anyway, what with all the night clowns.I decided not to get into it.Anyway, now I can move here! I hope you're ready, !
Don't see anybody you want me to ask?
There is.
Nope, sorry.
Uh, can you tell me who to ask, then?
No worries! Maybe another time!

Sorry for the wait! I went to ask the Resident Services people about moving here, and they said"How did you get here?! Oh no. This model was never supposed to leave his island. Call Mr. Nook. NOW!"I dunno what happened after that, but I think I smelled a soldering iron? Anyway, I can't move here.I hope we get to live on the same island one day. Maybe after whatever a "format and redeploy" is!

Hey! I asked Resident Services and<10_4 /> Someone who looks just like me is already gonna move here.And that's weird, right? Well, the best part about weird stuffis that you can always make it weirder.Maybe I'll ask this guy to share the island. He'll live part-time here, and I'll live part-time on his island
I asked the Resident Services, but the island's full up on residents, so I can't move in!What a shame. Oh well. I hope we get to live on the same island someday, .
I asked Resident Services and<10_4 /> there's no more room for new houses, so I can't move here!Total shame, but oh well. I still hope we get to live on the same island one day, .
So I talked to Resident Services and They said I can move here!! Man, starting tomorrow, we're neighbors! We're gonna hang out every day!
Or maybe I go and ask 'em again? Maybe this time they'll say, "We were being weird and silly! Move on in!"
Yeah, maybe!
I dunno...
You're right. I guess things don't change that quick, huh? Some other time then, !
I keep feeling like that whole scene was real weirdbut I also kinda forget it the more I think about it.Well, it's a shame I can't move here, but thanks for inviting me!

So when me and this other guy swap places, we'll have to pretend to be each other all day and night, but You'll know it's my turn to live on this island 'cause I'll make sure I never blink in front of you.
Your island's so packed with friends that you don't have any more room! That sounds like a fun island.It's a real shame I couldn't move here. But you inviting me made me feel good, !
Your island's so packed with folks, you can't fit any more. So I can't move here! Total downer.Well, if this is goodbye, then thanks for all the fun! I'll always remember my time here, !
Your island's cozy, everybody's nice, they smell good, and they feed me stuff. Man, I could stay here forever!
Why not live here?
Right?!
A huh huh huh, that sounds cool. Invite me again sometime!
Yeah, it's real neat here! Real darn neat. You're so lucky that you get to live here, .
This island's my favoritest place that doesn't got a menu to color while you wait for pie.
You should live here!
Thanks!
That's a neat idea! Ya oughta invite me back someday so I've got time to think about it, OK?Once I got elected sheriff 'cause I didn't think about what I was doing. So I think stuff through now.
You're lucky! You live here, and don't gotta leave unless space aliens make ya. I wanna come back someday!
